page.title: 04ANDOVER TODAY
page.content: The population in Andover today is 32,000. In Andover today I think there is too much litter and dirt around the town centre and there should be better shopping facilities. In Andover I think there should be more litter bins and posters which say throw your litter in the bin. In Andover we have a good Sports Centre and swimming pool. On Saturday and Thursday we have a busy market. We have a museum in Andover and they are building a new museum,next door to the old one. In Andover we have a lot of ducks because we have a lot of ponds and rivers.
